Package com.example.group1hrmsapp.service

Class EmployeeServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.group1hrmsapp.service.EmployeeServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmployeeService
@Service
public class EmployeeServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EmployeeService
A service class that implements the EmployeeService interface to provide core employee-related functionalities. This service is responsible for handling all operations related to Employee objects, such as retrieving, saving, and deleting employees from the repository.

    • findPaginated

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Employee> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated list of Employees sorted by a specific field and direction.
      Specified by:
      findPaginated in interface EmployeeService
      Parameters:
      pageNo - The page number to retrieve, starting from 1.
      pageSize - The number of Employees per page.
      sortField - The field by which to sort the Employees.
      sortDirection - The direction to sort the Employees. This should be 'ASC' for ascending order or 'DESC' for descending order.
      Returns:
      A Page of Employees based on the given page number and size, sorted by the given field and direction.
